title: The Matrix
overview: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion.

title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing is given a task of inception.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind causing chaos in Gotham.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
overview: A meek Hobbit and his companions set out to destroy the One Ring.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine.

title: Avatar
overview: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to Pandora on a unique mission.

title: Spirited Away
overview: During her family's move to the suburbs, a girl wanders into a world ruled by gods and spirits.
